block_comment: This block of code establishes a condition to check the timing of the data quotient (dq) vector at index 7. It utilizes an always block to perpetually monitor the value at `dq_in[7]`, and whenever `dq_in[7]` changes, the `dq_timing_check` function is executed with "7" as an argument, enforcing the timing check at this specific index in the data quotient vector.
